metadata.title: YouTube Algorithm Tips 2025: How to Get Recommended
metadata.description: Proven tips for working with the YouTube algorithm. Get more recommendations.

hero.headline: YouTube Algorithm Tips 2025
hero.subheadline: Work with the system. Get your videos recommended.

sections.content: The YouTube algorithm isn't mysterious—it optimizes for viewer satisfaction. Videos that keep people watching and returning get recommended. Understanding these principles helps you create content that the algorithm naturally promotes. Here are actionable tips.

content.title: Retention
content.description: How much of video people watch.

sections.title: Algorithm-Friendly Practices
content: Don't chase trends you can't deliver
Audience retention graph is your guide

faq.question: Can you beat the algorithm?
faq.answer: Wrong framing—work WITH it. Algorithm wants to show viewers content they'll enjoy. Make content viewers love, metrics follow, recommendations come. No tricks substitute for quality.

faq.question: Does posting time matter?
faq.answer: Somewhat—post when your audience is online. Analytics shows when subscribers watch. But great content performs regardless. Consistency of schedule matters more than specific time.

faq.question: Why did my video stop getting views?
faq.answer: Videos have lifecycles. Initial push tests CTR and retention. If metrics strong, continues. If weak, impressions slow. Evergreen content can resurge months later. New videos get new chances.

faq.question: Do hashtags and tags help?
faq.answer: Minimal impact on algorithm. Metadata helps categorization slightly. Title, thumbnail, and retention matter far more. Don't obsess over tags—focus on content quality.
